posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
So I guess everyone already has a signed T205 of Larry Doyle?  Nobody wants to make an offer?  I get that the card is a beater to the extreme, but the paper loss gave Laughing Larry a nice place to put his clear signature.  

Accepting offers to sell or trade at SignedT206@gmail.com

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1205787228.JPG[/IMG]

Posted By: T206Collector
Bumped because I just can't believe no one else thinks this card is cool enough to make me an offer.

Posted By: Michael Flaherty
...but I couldn't even guess what a fair offer would be.

A google search for autographed T205s yielded no results for comparison.

Posted By: J Levine
Same here. Would love to own it but have no idea where to begin. In all my t205 research I have not seen a signed t205. 

Joshua

Posted By: T206Collector
SOLD!!! Thanks for all the inquiries.
